Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: 15.04.2004 (SCR5992)
08.10.2013 JH SCR18455 Changed value of parameter PI.DATE with GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE if NULL
02.10.2013 GB SCR18447 Changed value of parameter PI.PROGRAM (if GB056 is called) from BAD310 to BAD310RO
13.08.2013 GB SCR18342 Removed the PI.SELECTION, changed format of file to csv
01.02.2013 SH SCR17924 Copy of BAD310, renamed to BAD310RO
17.12.2012 SH SCR17803 GB324 is now only called if a file is created
24.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
09.10.2012 GB SCR17596 Added column headers if PI.SELECTION = R
28.06.2012 GB SCR17404 Added the Send file via email
16.03.2012 SH SCR17116 Added TOTAMOUNTH/VATPERC, written to file if PI.SELECTION = 'R'
27.02.2012 SH SCR17160 Fields CLIENTNAME / FISCALCODE are now only written to file if PI.SELECTION = 'R'
01.02.2012 SH SCR17061 Added fields CLIENTNAME / FISCALCODE for output and PI.SELECTION
23.11.2010 SH SCR16007 Added PI.FREQUENCY and extended TMIN/TMIT selection
14.08.2007 SH SCR12805 Changed selection of LDGR now obtained now where
LDGR_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE
07.03.2005 SH SCR7905 Added parameter PI.DATE and added to RANGE on TMIN
14.02.2005 SH SCR7763 Added missing TMIT_DATE selection
30.06.2004 JJ SCR6517 added TMIN amoun field sin heller currency
-- If PI.DATE = 0 then use last date of previous month of actual date
... convert file to BU encoding (error handling is implemented in GB324)
Virtuals formatted for output
-- Test on ADMN_CREATE_DLMF = Y is implemented here, not in data selection because table TMIN and ADMN are not
in the same logical database
Numeric to string conversions according to output.. not type
Right aligned alpha fields..add leading spaces to make up for missing length
If Exrternal PL ledger known, use else use TMIN_LDGR_NO

ExpSyntax.val: 'adm'&';'&'Client nr'&';'&'VAT base or. ccy'&';'&'Ccy'&';'&'Inv date'&';'&'Typ'&';'&'Ledger number'&';'&'Invoice number'&';'&'VAT base in RON'&';'&'VAT in RON'&';'&'Client name'&';'&'VAT registration no'&';'&'Tot. invoice RON'&';'&'VAT %'
